Room.Name: Main Street/Golden Dolphin Way Intersection - South Gate
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Golden Dolphin Way and Main Street.
Room.LongDescription: You are at one of the primary entrances to the town. In fact, its only one of four basic ways into town, not including scaling the City Walls. The City Walls are constantly patrolled by guards. Golden Dolphin travels along the southern wall of the city going east to west. Main Street heads into the center of town, and more immediately, the main shopping districts of Oceancrest, south of Nylandian Bay.
